resources.string: <center>We would like to use your current location to help find available work orders near you, give you accurate distance measurements, gain access to work orders that require GPS, and check in and check out on site.</center>

We need access to a small portion of your system storage to store temporary files and to allow you to download and upload files from a work order.
Without this permission the Field Nation app will not work.
<center>We would like access to your camera so you can take photos or videos to upload to your work orders.</center>
